pr_title: DHFPROD-5547: Tooltips and word fixes for detailed view

timeline.bodyText:
Can you pls change all the 'exist' to 'be.visible'.
'exist' condition might pass even when the tooltip is available in the DOM(which is true for some tooltip I think) but not visible.
timeline.author: bsrikan
